vlive.korean: 그게 뭐 확률이 낮나? Would I have worse odds? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.105
"확통" 확률과 통계죠? "Hwak-tong". That's short for probability and statistics, right? 듣기 View video WINNER : 숙제도우미(숙제 도와드립니다)
vlive.english: "Hwak-tong". That's short for probability and statistics, right?

vlive.korean: [확률은 50:50] 어려운 거 나오면 어떻게 해? [The chance is 50:50] What if it's more difficult? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY "TIME TO TWICE" EP.02
vlive.english: [The chance is 50:50] What if it's more difficult?

vlive.korean: 지민! - 2분의 1 확률이야 - 찾았어! Jimin. - 50% chance! - He did! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.91
'오늘 저녁에 V LIVE 다시 켤 확률은?' "The chances of turning on V LIVE tonight?" 듣기 View video TWICE : 다시!!!!
vlive.english: "The chances of turning on V LIVE tonight?"

examples.korean: The chances are a million to one against being struck by lightning. 발음듣기 벼락에 맞을 가능성[확률]은 100만분의 1이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The chances are a million to one against being struck by lightning. 발음

examples.korean: There is a 60% probability that the population will be infected with the disease. 발음듣기 주민들이 그 질병에 감염될 확률은 60%이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There is a 60% probability that the population will be infected with the disease. 발음

examples.korean: Big cities have a high problihood of a traffic jam. 발음듣기 대도시에서는 차량 정체가 일어날 확률이 높다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Big cities have a high problihood of a traffic jam. 발음

examples.korean: The self-righteous are often probability blind. 발음듣기 독선적인 사람들은 종종 확률맹이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The self-righteous are often probability blind. 발음

examples.korean: A top-four finish is still very much possible for Spurs as well, even though the prospect of qualifying for the Champions League for a fourth successive season is suddenly far from a sure thing after the two-month collapse in form. 발음듣기 지난 두 달간 슬럼프를 겪으며 4시즌 연속 챔피언스리그 진출권을 획득하는 것이 확실치 않아진 토트넘이지만, 그래도 리그 4위 안에 들 확률은 매우 높다. The Korea Times
examples.english: A top-four finish is still very much possible for Spurs as well, even though the prospect of qualifying for the Champions League for a fourth successive season is suddenly far from a sure thing after the two-month collapse in form. 발음
